text: Armin Bittner (born November 28, 1964) is a German former alpine skier.ski- db.com He was born in Garmisch-Partenkirchen. He won a total of 7 Alpine Skiing World Cup races, all in Slalom. He competed in the 1988, 1992, and 1994 Winter Olympic Games, but did not win any medals.sports-reference.com ==World Cup victories== ===World Cups=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season !
